events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and I want to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been classified under refund due to customer's request for money back after receiving an incorrect item.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the trouble with your order. Let me assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue and start the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing that the item sent is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. No need to return the wrong item.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer without having to return the wrong item. Thank you!
The refund has been successfully initiated. You should see the amount reflected in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Since we have not received further inquiries, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
